name: Christ the Redeemer
description: An iconic statue of Jesus Christ in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

name: Eiffel Tower
description: A wrought-iron lattice tower in Paris, France.

name: Pyramid of Menkaure
description: The smallest of the three pyramids of Giza, Egypt.

description: A colossal neoclassical sculpture on Liberty Island in New York City.

name: Torre Pisa
description: The famous leaning tower in Pisa, Italy.
